text:
so many universal themes happening in this one.

bone bone bone bone bone bone

text: Little Nephew looks so innocent in panel 3.

text: G A S P

name: spectre
text: Alt text: "Tomorrow is the man-to-man talk."

name: spectre
text: Look, your male role model / caregiver lounges around all day half-drunk, pimped-out and talking about sex all the time. You're bound to get some donked ideas . . . umm, gee, wait . . . gotta go, I need to fix some things with my stepson. Ooops.

name: byronic
text: We all want to get our Bone on from time to time.

name: tekende
text: I haven't gotten my bone on in a long time. I am hoping to rectify this tonight. I'll let you know how it goes, if I remember.

name: tekende
text:
Okay, so when I posted this I totally expected that I would be disappointed last night, as far as boning goes. I explain this because I do not want to seem like I am bragging.

But guys. I totally got my bone on last night. I was like, bone...bone...bone...

name: riazm
text:
Nice work w/ boning.

As long as it wasn't my brother in law that you... Boned?

name: i_love_kate
text: I'm giving you a chubby because apparently it's no more than you deserve.

name: zapatos
text:
Good job Tekende!

Now try again.

name: tekende
text: I have gotten my bone on at least five times since that post.

name: zapatos
text:
Good job Tekende!

Now try again.

name: leftsaidtim
text: Repeat ad-nauseum.

name: evolume
text: The beginning of the end of innocence for LN.

name: heyman
text: It may have been spurred on by Teodor's prodigious dirty talking at his birthday party

name: tapaidhnaomh
text: Little Nephew, like many young children, plays a musical instrument. And like many absent caregivers, Ray does not know what it it.

name: spinynorman
text: One character is shocked by the idea of youths getting it on and slamming pelvises, while somewhere in the house a five year old becomes a man.

name: overmedicated
text:
Panel One:

Little Nephew spots a bearded man shuffling around inside a cardboard box sniggering quietly.

name: redjoker
text: chubbied for mgs reference

name: coco
text: I love Ray's pimp chalice . . . and the probability that sometime between panel 3 and panel 4, the chalice was dropped in shock.

name: belgand
text: That is not a chalice, it is a margarita glass. There is nothing classy about that unless you think that middle-aged paralegals getting ripped at Chi-Chis on $7 frozen "mango" drinks is especially pimp.

name: fineoakstructure
text: I normally think of it as a margarita glass, as well, but I've often seen people drink champagne out of similar glasses (obviously, it's not the traditional flute), even at fancy parties.

name: belgand
text:
Yes, the champagne goblet also exists and is rumored to be based on a lady's breast. Specifically a famous lady whom I'm too lazy to look up right now.

The flute, I am told, does a better job of concentrating the bubbles and is thus the better vessel to use, but I have no practical experience in these matters.

A chalice would have taller, straight sides. A goblet would have rounded sides and more of a bulbous shape. A champagne goblet would be a bit taller and rounded more towards the bottom. That is a margarita glass. Or, on second inspection, it maybe could be a champagne goblet but it isn't drawn precisely enough to distinguish. I shall saw that given Ray I think that is the proper call to make.

name: chachibenji
text: Bone is capitalized because it is an important activity.

name: catgrl131
text: Is this the first instance of a character with an opened mouth?

name: professorriffs
text: Man we ain't seen Little Nephew in a grip.  Where is he be?

name: zapatos
text: If LN wants to get his bone on, like Ray gets his bone on...  Then LN will not be getting his bone on.

name: vermy
text: Little Nephew. Oh, why couldn't have you stayed a one shot character and not a little hip hop pissant.

name: carlyle
text: Worst uncle or best uncle?
